text: Mama June Shannon was rushed to the hospital on Friday's episode of Mama June : From Not To Hot. The reality star, 38, was taken to the emergency room by her beau Geno and daughter Alana - aka Honey Boo Boo - after waking up without vision in both eyes. On the way to surgery, Mama June exclaimed : ` ` What if I lose sight in my good eye? I went totally blind in my right eye four years ago!'Health scare : Mama June Shannon, 38, was rushed to the hospital on Friday's episode of Mama June : From Not To Hot'I may not be able to see Pumpkin's baby,'she added regarding her teenage daughter who is pregnant.
